reviewText: Excellent. Outstanding 7.1 audio (it uses all the channels to good effect). You can sample their music on YouTube to see if you like their style.

when 3D tech  mixes with visual art and the art of music they form  apeak rarely discovered. I watched licht mond 1 over my LG screen first time I buy  3D TV and the shock was overwhelming  Up until now I keep watching it and never got fed up,  sure I will purchase licht mond 3  and any other likewise arty production. unlike a blue ray 3d movie ,once watched ,twice banalised, this one is fun. It is like watching dreams
